C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

command:
password_aux="${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD:-}"
if [[ -f "${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE:-}" ]]; then
    password_aux=$(cat "$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE")
fi
mysqladmin status -uroot -p"${password_aux}"

password_aux="${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD:-}"
if [[ -f "${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE:-}" ]]; then
    password_aux=$(cat "$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE")
fi
mysqladmin status -uroot -p"${password_aux}"

password_aux="${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD:-}"
if [[ -f "${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE:-}" ]]; then
    password_aux=$(cat "$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD_FILE")
fi
mysqladmin status -uroot -p"${password_aux}"

args:
#!/bin/bash

. /opt/bitnami/scripts/libfs.sh
# We copy the logs folder because it has symlinks to stdout and stderr
if ! is_dir_empty /opt/bitnami/mysql/logs; then
  cp -r /opt/bitnami/mysql/logs /emptydir/app-logs-dir
fi
initContainers.name: preserve-logs-symlinks
